verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3427><s%> "Come here. <S%G1204><s%> I will show <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> prostitute <S%G4204><s%> who sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> waters, <S%G5204><s%>

with <S%G3326><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> committed sexual immorality, <S%G4203><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who dwell <S%G2730><s%> in the earth <S%G1093><s%> were made drunken <S%G3184><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> of her <S%G846><s%> sexual immorality. <S%G4202><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He carried <S%G667><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> away in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a wilderness. <S%G2048><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a scarlet-colored <S%G2847><s%> animal, <S%G2342><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of blasphemous <S%G988><s%> names, <S%G3686><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> horns. <S%G2768><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The woman <S%G1135><s%> was dressed <S%G4016><s%> in purple <S%G4209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> decked <S%G5558><s%> with gold <S%G5557><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pearls, <S%G3135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of abominations <S%G946><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the impurities <S%G168><s%> of the sexual immorality <S%G4202><s%> of the earth. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> her <S%G846><s%> forehead <S%G3359><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> was written, <S%G1125><s%> "MYSTERY, <S%G3466><s%> BABYLON <S%G897><s%> THE GREAT, <S%G3173><s%> THE MOTHER <S%G3384><s%> OF THE PROSTITUTES <S%G4204><s%> AND <S%G2532><s%> OF THE ABOMINATIONS <S%G946><s%> OF THE EARTH. <S%G1093><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> drunken <S%G3184><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the martyrs <S%G3144><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> <S%G2532><s%> When I saw <S%G1492><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> I wondered <S%G2296><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> amazement. <S%G2295><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The angel <S%G32><s%> said to <S%G2036><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> "Why do you <S%G4671><s%> wonder? <S%G2296><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will tell <S%G2046><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> that carries <S%G941><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns. <S%G2768><s%>

The beast <S%G2342><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> was, <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> about to come <S%G305><s%> up out of <S%G1537><s%> the abyss <S%G12><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> destruction. <S%G684><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Those who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> have not <S%G3756><s%> been written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> will marvel <S%G2296><s%> when they see <S%G991><s%> that the beast <S%G2342><s%> was, <S%G3748><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall be <S%G2539><s%> present. <S%G2076><s%>

Here <S%G5602><s%> is the mind <S%G3563><s%> that has <S%G2192><s%> wisdom. <S%G4678><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> mountains, <S%G3699><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> which <S%G846><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> sits. <S%G2521><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They are <S%G1526><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> kings. <S%G935><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> have fallen, <S%G4098><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> has not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%> <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> he <S%G846><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> he must <S%G1163><s%> continue <S%G3306><s%> a little while. <S%G3641><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The beast <S%G2342><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> was, <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> an eighth, <S%G3590><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seven; <S%G2033><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he goes <S%G5217><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> destruction. <S%G684><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> have received <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3768><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> as yet, <S%G3768><s%> but <S%G235><s%> they receive <S%G2983><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> kings, <S%G935><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> mind, <S%G1106><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they give <S%G1239><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to the beast. <S%G2342><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> will war <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> will overcome <S%G3528><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of lords, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of kings. <S%G935><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They also will overcome who are <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> chosen <S%G1588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful. <S%G4103><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "The waters <S%G5204><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw, <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> the prostitute <S%G4204><s%> sits, <S%G2521><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> peoples, <S%G2992><s%> <S%G2532><s%> multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> <S%G2532><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> languages. <S%G1100><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> will hate <S%G3404><s%> the prostitute, <S%G4204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will make <S%G4160><s%> her <S%G846><s%> desolate, <S%G2049><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will make her naked, <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will eat <S%G5315><s%> her <S%G846><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will burn <S%G2618><s%> her <S%G846><s%> utterly with <S%G1722><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has put <S%G1325><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> what he <S%G846><s%> has in mind, <S%G1106><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be of one <S%G1520><s%> mind, <S%G1106><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> their <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> to the beast, <S%G2342><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should be accomplished. <S%G5055><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The woman <S%G1135><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G2192><s%> reigns <S%G932><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"
